original_text: Thus was Midian subdued before the children of Israel, so that they lifted up their heads no more. And the country was in quietness forty years in the days of Gideon.
korean_text: 미디안이 이스라엘 자손 앞에 복종하여 다시는 그 머리를 들지 못하였으므로 기드온이 사는 사십 년 동안 그 땅이 평온하였더라

sentences.original_text: so that they lifted up their heads no more
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다시는 고개를 들지 못하게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: And the country was in quietness
